pyrimidine package
==================

pyrimidine is a competitive framework for genetic algorithms

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Subpackages

   pyrimidine.benchmarks
   pyrimidine.learn
   pyrimidine.local_search
   pyrimidine.misc
